trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around July 9th 2010
Summary: Very bright intermitent flashes of light.
divs: sighting detailsi stepped outside for a cigarette and seen a very bright flash of light above my head. when i looked up i expected to see a firefly as they are common this time of night\year. instead i seen a very dim point of light almost unviewable traveling from south to north that within a minute traveled through the little dipper. the object appeared to be in the outer atmosphere. while viewing this point of light it flashed very brightly every few seconds (approximately 5 to 7 seconds). it flashed very brightly 2 or 3 times before it apparently quit flashing. it was at this time i lost sight of it. the object would not have been noticed if it did not flash. there were no other witnesses, photos.
